Detailed Description

Class CBTConnection This class contains functionality to establish BT connections and receive BT connections. Includes functionality to search remote services (SDP) and register local services and security issues.

Definition at line 646 of file bteng.h.

IMPORT_C TInt CBTConnection::SearchRemoteDeviceL ( CBTDevice &  aDevice,
TBTMajorServiceClass  aServiceClass 
)

Method which invokes Search Dialog and returns CBTDevice from call. Device search can be filtered (default filtering off) with aServiceClass parameter. Returned CBTDevice instance includes BDAddress, DeviceName and Class Of Device. Parameters:

Parameters:
aDevice Device, which is returned from device search.
aService Service filter for device search. can filter e.g. object transfer cabable devices according to Major Service class.
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.

IMPORT_C TInt CBTConnection::SearchRemoteDeviceL ( CBTDevice &  aDevice  ) 

Method which invokes Search Dialog and returns CBTDevice from call. Returned CBTDevice instance includes BDAddress, DeviceName and Class of Device. Parameters:

Parameters:
aDevice Device, which is returned from device search.
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.

IMPORT_C TInt CBTConnection::SearchRemoteChannelL ( const CBTDevice &  aDevice,
TUint  aService,
TUint &  aChannel 
)

Method which makes SDP query to remote device and returns RFCOMM channel where required service is located. Note! At this point this does only Protocol attribute search to a given service. Parameters:

Parameters:
aDevice Device where SDP query is made to.
aService Service which is searched.
aChannel RFCOMM Channel to be returned.
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.

IMPORT_C TInt CBTConnection::RegisterSecuritySettingsL ( TUint  aService,
TInt  aProtocol,
TUint  aChannel,
TBool  aAuthenticate,
TBool  aAuthorise,
TBool  aEncrypt 
)

DEPRECATED!

Method which registers Security settings to Security Manager. Returns value according to succession. Protocols (according to bt_sock.h definitions) HCI KSolBtHCI Link Manager KSolBtLM L2CAP KSolBtL2CAP RFCOMM KSolBtRFCOMM

Parameters:

Parameters:
aService Service which is registered.
aProtool Protocol where the service is based on.
aChannel RFCOMM Channel to be registered.
aAuthenticate Authentication enabled TRUE/FALSE
aAuthorise Authorisation enabled TRUE/FALSE
aEncrypt Encryption enabled TRUE/FALSE
Returns:
TInt KErrNotSupported
Deprecated:

DEPRECATED!

Parameters:
aService Service which is unregistered.
Returns:

aListenSocket Socket which is initiated for listening.
aChannel RFCOMM channel which is reserved for listening.
aAuthenticate Authentication enabled TRUE/FALSE
aAuthorise Authorisation enabled TRUE/FALSE
aEncrypt Encryption enabled TRUE/FALSE
Returns:

IMPORT_C TInt CBTConnection::PassiveConnectSocketL ( RSocketServ &  aSocketServer,
RSocket &  aDataSocket,
RSocket &  aListenSocket,
TUint &  aChannel,
TRequestStatus &  aStatus 
)

Method which opens socket to SocketServer, which reference is given to an instance and starts to listen to that socket. After remote client makes connection request to that socket, function returns to caller. Error situations are handled with return value <> 0. Parameters:

Parameters:
aSocketServer Handle to connected socket server.
aDataSocket Socket where incoming connection is accepted.
aListenSocket Socket which is initiated for listening.
aChannel RFCOMM channel which is reserved for listening.
aStatus TRequestStatus instance for asynchronous connecting.
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.

IMPORT_C void CBTConnection::CancelPassiveConnectSocketL ( RSocket &  aListenSocket  ) 

Method which cancels the outstanding accept operation of a socket Parameters:

Parameters:
aListenSocket Socket which is outstanding accept operation
Returns:

IMPORT_C TInt CBTConnection::ActiveConnectSocketL ( RSocketServ &  aSocketServer,
RSocket &  aSocket,
CBTDevice &  aDevice,
TUint  aChannel,
TRequestStatus &  aStatus 
)

Method which opens socket to SocketServer, which reference is given to an instance and starts a RFCOMM connection request to that socket. After this functiona returns to caller. Error values are indicated with return value <> 0 Parameters:

Parameters:
aSocketServer Handle to connected socket server.
aSocket Socket where connection is made
aDevice Remote device where connection is made.
aChannel RFCOMM channel where connection is made.
aStatus TRequestStatus instance for asynchronous connecting.
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.

IMPORT_C TInt CBTConnection::ActiveConnectSocketL ( RSocketServ &  aSocketServer,
RSocket &  aSocket,
TInt  aProtocol,
CBTDevice &  aDevice,
TUint  aChannel,
TRequestStatus &  aStatus 
)

Method which opens socket to SocketServer, which reference is given to an instance and starts a defined protocol connection request to that socket. After this functiona returns to caller. Error values are indicated with return value <> 0 Protocols (according to bt_sock.h definitions) L2CAP KSolBtL2CAP RFCOMM KSolBtRFCOMM HCI KSolBtHCI (returns KErrNotSupported) Link Manager KSolBtLM (returns KErrNotSupported) Parameters:

Parameters:
aSocketServer Handle to connected socket server.
aSocket Socket where connection is made
aProtool Protocol where the service is based on.
aDevice Remote device where connection is made.
aChannel RFCOMM channel where connection is made.
aStatus TRequestStatus instance for asynchronous connecting.
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.

IMPORT_C TInt CBTConnection::ActiveConnectSocketL ( RSocketServ &  aSocketServer,
RSocket &  aSocket,
CBTDevice &  aDevice,
TUint  aChannel,
TBTServiceSecurity  aSec,
TRequestStatus &  aStatus,
TUint  aProtocol = KSolBtRFCOMM 
)

Method which opens socket to SocketServer, which reference is given to an instance and starts a defined protocol connection request to that socket. After this functiona returns to caller. Error values are indicated with return value <> 0 Protocols (according to bt_sock.h definitions) L2CAP KSolBtL2CAP RFCOMM KSolBtRFCOMM HCI KSolBtHCI (returns KErrNotSupported) Link Manager KSolBtLM (returns KErrNotSupported) Parameters:

Parameters:
aSocketServer Handle to connected socket server.
aSocket Socket where connection is made
aProtool Protocol where the service is based on.
aDevice Remote device where connection is made.
aChannel RFCOMM channel where connection is made.
aSec The security settings for this connection
aStatus TRequestStatus instance for asynchronous connecting.
aProtocol The protocol defined for this connection
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.

IMPORT_C TInt CBTConnection::GetRemoteDeviceInfoL ( RSocket &  aSocket,
CBTDevice &  aDevice 
)

Method which gets remote device address from open RSocket, searches information from BT Registry and returns found information to given CBTDevice instance. Error values are indicated with return value <> 0 Parameters:

Parameters:
aSocket Socket which has active connection with remote device
aDevice CBTDevice instance where information is updated.
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.

IMPORT_C TInt CBTConnection::DisconnectSocketL ( RSocket &  asocket,
RSocket::TShutdown  aHow = RSocket::ENormal 
)

Method which disconnects an open RSocket-instance. Also an option for shutdown can be passed. Default value for this option is RSocket::ENormal. Error values are indicated with return value <> 0 Parameters:

Parameters:
aSocket Socket which has active connection with remote device
aHow Information about the reason of shutdown.
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.

IMPORT_C TInt CBTConnection::PerformBondingL ( CBTDevice &  aDevice,
MBTBondingObserver *  aBondingObserver 
)

Method which 1st creates L2CAP connection to remote device's signalling CID and then requests authentication for that connection. --> dedicated bonding procedure is done. Parameters:

Parameters:
aDevice Remote device information (only BDAddress needed).
aBondingObserver Pointer to bonding observer instance.
Returns:
TInt KErrNone if OK, else value indicating error situation.
